visionary.explanation: Consistently predicts and adapts to emerging tech trends, especially in AI and machine learning

resilience.explanation: Bounced back from two failed startups before current success, maintained team morale through difficult periods

riskTolerance.explanation: Willing to enter emerging markets and adopt cutting-edge technologies, but maintains careful risk assessment protocols

adaptability.explanation: Quickly pivoted business model during market changes, regularly updates product strategy based on user feedback

charisma.explanation: Strong public speaker, builds genuine connections with team and investors

confidence.explanation: Self-assured in decision-making, openly acknowledges areas for improvement

drive.explanation: Works consistently towards goals, inspires team with clear vision and energy

communicationSkills.explanation: Articulate in presenting complex technical concepts to diverse audiences

empathy.explanation: Actively seeks to understand user needs and team concerns

decisionMaking.explanation: Makes data-driven decisions quickly, willing to adjust based on new information
